programme.title: Repeat
programme.desc: Following the daily routine of young kiwi motocross rider, Ezra Holmes; a gritty look into Holmes' routines, between working on a dairy farm and regularly hitting the dirt tracks on his motorcycle.

programme.desc: Australian surfer Harry Bryant travels to some iconic surf sports around the world, pulling off some jaw-dropping tricks.

programme.title: REMOTE: The Lost Footage
programme.desc: Made from outtakes and extra footage from the iconic 1972 surf film "Morning of the Earth," this artistic showcase paints a more complete picture of that surfing era, while revealing culturally, environmentally and socially significant details.

programme.title: Red Monkey, Full Moon
programme.desc: Mick Fanning and Mason Ho experienced a Red Monkey Full Moon, a phenomenon that happens every 10000 years and opens the possibility to travel in time. Back to 2019 and to a memorable surf trip in Bali for the two surfers.
